subject: Masters Golf Tournament
Golf
Ratings and Rating Systems
Television
lead_paragraph: Charl Schwartzel’s stunning victory in the Masters generated a 10.4 preliminary overnight Nielsen rating Sunday on CBS — down from a 12.0 last year, when Phil Mickelson won and Tiger Woods returned to competitive golf.
snippet: Charl Schwartzel’s stunning victory in the Masters generated a 10.4 preliminary overnight Nielsen rating Sunday on CBS — down from a 12.0 last year, when Phil Mickelson won and Tiger Woods returned to competitive golf.
